1. You will spit on his face for points determined by where it lands.

    Forehead – 1 point

    Cheek – 2 points

    Mouth (closed) – 3 points

    Mouth (open) – 5 points

    Tongue held out properly – 10 points

2. He must thank you after each spit — failure to do so means he loses all his points and starts over.

3. If he flinches, wipes, or breaks eye contact, subtract 5 points.

4. Once he reaches 50 points, reward him. That could mean a small treat, a kiss to the forehead, or permission to kiss your boot — your choice.

title: Human Footstool
content:
You don’t need furniture when you have him.


Make him kneel down in front of your favorite chair. Have him place his forearms flat on the ground, shoulder-width apart, and lower his back until it's flat and parallel to the floor. Adjust him until he’s perfectly positioned — like the furniture he’s about to become.

Instructions:

    Command silence. He may not speak unless given permission. His only job now is to be still, stable, and useful.

    Rest your feet on him — cross-legged, one heel digging into his back — however you’re comfortable. If he winces or shifts kick him and mock him of his weakness.

    Read a book. Scroll your phone. Sip your drink. Occasionally glance down to inspect your furniture. Is he sagging? Correct it with a kick,
  
  Add difficulty. If he’s doing well, place a book or small weight on his back. Tell him he’s being tested for endurance — after all, real footstools don’t move.

    Time it. Set a timer for 10, 15, or 20 minutes. Make him hold position without complaint. If he endures it, reward him. If not, remind him what he’s good for and start over.

Optional Reward:
Let him kiss your sole once, if he impresses you. Or maybe he just gets to be your footstool again tomorrow — if he earns that privilege.

title: My Pony
content:
Today, your sub is your loyal pony—your personal ride wherever you want to go.

Put a leash in his mouth and make him get down on all fours. Tell him he’s your pony now, and he’s going to carry you around.

Whenever you want to move around the room, the kitchen, or even outside he’s got to be ready to carry you like your own personal horse.

Hold his leash and guide him wherever you want to go.

If he slows down, stops, or tries to resist, dig into his ass with your nails or spank him.

If he still doesn’t listen, make him stay on all fours without moving for a set time as a punishment—no breaks, no rest, just waiting until you say otherwise.

When he listens and moves right, praise him a little to keep him motivated.

Make him neigh if you want.

No matter where you take him, he’s your faithful mount ready to serve and carry you anytime you want.

title: Marking Territory
content:
You’re out in public, a busy café, a classy bar, wherever.

Without him noticing, you lean in and deliberately spit into his drink. Not just a little — enough so he can taste you, your control, in every sip.

You hand it back with a cold smile, locking eyes with him, and say, “Drink it all. No hesitation. No excuses.”

If he slows down or hesitates, you whisper right into his ear, loud enough only for him:
“Refuse, and you’ll regret it later.”

The tension builds as he drinks, swallowing not just the liquid, but your dominance—right there in front of strangers who remain clueless.

You keep a firm grip on his wrist, squeezing lightly as a reminder: he belongs to you, and this little act seals it.

title: The Foot Gag
content:
You sit back, shoving your foot into his open mouth. 

“No moving” you command. 

He tries to adjust, but you shove it deeper, reminding him who’s in charge. Watching him struggle to obey while gagging on your feet. When you’re done, pull your foot away, deciding if he earned praise or punishment.

title: Ball Buster
content:
You have him kneel before you, eyes locked on yours. With every gentle kick to his balls, he must count out load “One… two…” focusing on each strike. 

If he misses a count or hesitates, the next kick gets a little harder as a reminder to stay sharp. The light kicks keep him squirming, but the promise of a stronger one if he slips turns the counting into a tense, fun game where you’re always in control.

title: Facial
content:
Men absolutely hate the smell of their own cum, that bitter, salty scent that lingers. 

Give him a hand job and make him think it's a reward, after making him cum, take it and slowly rub it all over his face. 

Make sure he knows he isn’t allowed to wash it off until you say so. Watch him sit there with his face covered in cum.

You can also choose to not let him wash his face, the cum will solidify making him extremely uncomfortable but watching him squirm will be fun!
